title: SP Iqbal pins ranks on two newly promoted head constables
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 22 (APP): Islamabad Police Security Division held a dignified ceremony on Sunday to honor two police officers Muhammad Aamir and Muhammad Saeed who were promoted from Constable to Head Constable.
An official told APP that the SP VIP Route Muhammad Iqbal Khan and DSP Diplomatic Muhammad Ayub Awan formally pinned ranks on the newly promoted officers.
He said the officers extended heartfelt congratulations and expressed sincere wishes for the continued success of the promoted personnel.
SP  Iqbal while addressing the ceremony, stated that Inspector General of Police (IGP) Islamabad, Syed Ali Nasir Rizvi, has issued clear directives to ensure timely promotions against all vacant posts without delay.
SP Iqbal said, “This promotion is a result of your hard work and dedication. It is by the grace of Allah Almighty that you have reached this position. With your new rank comes greater responsibility.”
SP added that the officers must fulfill their duties with excellence, bring honor to the department, and work with a mission to promote police welfare and deliver justice to the public by creating ease for citizens.
SP Iqbal further said, “I hope you will continue to perform your duties with the same dedication, integrity, professionalism, and a spirit of service to the people.”
